name: DLink | DxS_Cisco_CLI | Network | IP | ARP Moved (SYSLOG)
description: *Jul 25 00:37:36: %ARP-4-ARPCHANGEMAC: ARP entry 10.202.215.188 on VLAN 334 changed 1caf.f728.71ff to 0013.8f1e.5f32 due to ARP packet from GigabitEthernet 0/17.

patterns.value_re: %ARP-4-ARPCHANGEMAC: ARP entry (?P<ip>\S+) on VLAN \d+ changed (?P<from_mac>\S+) to (?P<to_mac>\S+) due to ARP packet from (?P<interface>.+)\.$
